UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antibacterial Activity and Potential Application in Food Packaging of Peptides Derived from Turbot Viscera Hydrolysate.
Literature.Author: Bi J, Tian C, Jiang J, Zhang G-L, Hao H, Hou H-M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=10 µM,Human erythrocytes:80% Hemolysis=160 µM,Human hepatocyte cells HL-7702 (L02):5% Killing=20 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli CICC 10670(MIC=80µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=80µM),Hafnia alvei H4(MIC=80µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=80µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MIC=40µM),Bacillus subtilis CMCC 63501(MIC=80µM)
